sn35.232:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn35.232:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn35.232:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.232:2.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ …pe…
sn35.232:2.2: jivhā rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, rasā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ …pe…
sn35.232:2.3: mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, dhammā manassa saṃyojanan”ti?
sn35.232:3.1: “Na kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:3.2: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ …pe…
sn35.232:3.3: na jivhā rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rasā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:3.4: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ …pe…
sn35.232:3.5: na mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na dhammā manassa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:3.6: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:4.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kāḷo ca balībaddo odāto ca balībaddo ekena dāmena vā yottena vā saṃyuttā assu.
sn35.232:4.3: ‘kāḷo balībaddo odātassa balībaddassa saṃyojanaṃ, odāto balībaddo kāḷassa balībaddassa saṃyojanan’ti, sammā nu kho so vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
sn35.232:4.5: “Na kho, āvuso, kāḷo balībaddo odātassa balībaddassa saṃyojanaṃ, na odāto balībaddo kāḷassa balībaddassa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:4.6: Yena ca kho te ekena dāmena vā yottena vā saṃyuttā taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:5.1: Evameva kho, āvuso, na cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:5.2: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ …pe…
sn35.232:5.4: na mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na dhammā manassa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:5.5: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:6.1: Cakkhu vā, āvuso, rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ abhavissa, rūpā vā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ, nayidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35.232:6.2: Yasmā ca kho, āvuso, na cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ;
sn35.232:6.3: yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ, tasmā brahmacariyavāso paññāyati sammā dukkhakkhayāya …pe….
sn35.232:7.1: Jivhā, āvuso, rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ abhavissa, rasā vā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ, nayidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35.232:7.2: Yasmā ca kho, āvuso, na jivhā rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rasā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ; yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ, tasmā brahmacariyavāso paññāyati sammā dukkhakkhayāya …pe….
sn35.232:8.1: Mano vā, āvuso, dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ abhavissa, dhammā vā manassa saṃyojanaṃ, nayidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35.232:8.2: Yasmā ca kho, āvuso, na mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na dhammā manassa saṃyojanaṃ;
sn35.232:8.3: yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ, tasmā brahmacariyavāso paññāyati sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35.232:9.1: Imināpetaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā na cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:9.2: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ …pe…
sn35.232:9.4: na mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na dhammā manassa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:9.5: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:11.1: Iminā kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā na cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ;
sn35.232:11.2: yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:11.5: na jivhā rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rasā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ;
sn35.232:11.6: yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.232:11.8: na mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na dhammā manassa saṃyojanaṃ;
sn35.232:11.9: yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanan”ti.
